title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, embeddings, and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for chatting, pulling, and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean React chat interface that talks to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run private LLM prompts on your notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that streams Ollama responses into threads with per-channel model selection.
